subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Louisville walked away with a convincing 69-55 victory over Villanova Friday night in the Big East semifinals, making a case for No. 1 seed in the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: Louisville walked away with a convincing 69-55 victory over Villanova Friday night in the Big East semifinals, making a case for No. 1 seed in the N.C.A.A. tournament.
